function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks due to lack of physical distancing.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, enforce physical distancing, and limit the number of simultaneous interactions.","Technologies":"AI for monitoring physical distancing, contactless payment systems, and voice-activated interfaces.","People":"Shoppers, retail staff, and anyone who interacts with the technology.","Owner":"Retailers, technology developers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures.","Impact":"Higher risk of close proximity interactions and reduced awareness of personal space.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for interaction, limit the duration of virtual interactions, and use visual cues to maintain physical distance.","Technologies":"Virtual reality headsets, holographic displays, and proximity sensors.","People":"Shoppers, salespersons, and anyone participating in virtual interactions.","Owner":"Retailers, VR technology providers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission through close interactions with humanoid robots.","Mitigation":"Limit physical contact with robots, sanitize surfaces regularly, and provide clear instructions for safe interaction.","Technologies":"Humanoid robots, touchless interfaces, and voice-activated controls.","People":"Retail staff, customers, and anyone in the vicinity of the robots.","Owner":"Retailers, robot manufacturers, and public health authorities"}]}
